fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Business and Industry, Environment, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Climate Action, Communication
eu_initiatives:
Common Agricultural Policy 
Rural Development Programmes especially agri-environmnent schemes 
Natura 2000 and Birds and Habitats Directives
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
European Environmental Bureau 
European Network on Nature Conservation and Pastoralism (EFNCP) 
European Landowners Organisation 
Agricultural and Rural Convention ARC 2020 
CEEWEB for Biodiversity
goals__remit:
Conservation of High Nature Value farmed landscapes in Romania, and support of the rural communities within them. 
Includes conservation actions, farm advisory services, research and policy advocacy
relevant_communication:
European Parliament / DG Environment Results Based Agri-environment Payments Scheme (RBAPS) pilot scheme. 
Winner of DG Envi Natura 2000 prize 2014 for EU project bringing most benefits to local communities in a protected area. 
Winner of top DG Agri Communication prizes, for communicating the CAP to farmers, and innovative communication, in 2012 and 2013 respectively.
